arts.ttl: Russell Martin issues angry response to Brighton boss after furious on-pitch row
arts.sum: Southampton boss Russell Martin clashed with his Brighton counterpart Fabian Hurzeler after the full-time whistle blew in their 1-1 draw in the Premier League on Friday night

arts.ttl: Southampton boss Russell Martin fumes at VAR decision after Premier League issue statement
arts.sum: Southampton were furious to see Cameron Archer's goal against Brighton ruled out for an offside call against Adam Armstrong, who VAR deemed to be interfering with play

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Pedro blank + Southampton’s costly yellow cards
arts.sum: Key notes, quotes and stats from Brighton v Southampton The post FPL notes: Pedro blank + Southampton’s costly yellow cards appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: 'A big problem' - did VAR get Southampton's disallowed goal wrong?
arts.sum: Southampton boss Russell Martin says the video assistant referee (VAR) system is a "big problem" for the Premier League if it is disallowing goals like Cameron Archer's against Brighton.

arts.ttl: 'Educated' - Fabian Hurzeler reacts to Russell Martin clash after Southampton frustration
arts.sum: Reaction from Brighton’s draw with Southampton

arts.ttl: Russell Martin and Fabian Hurzeler claim lack of respect after bad-tempered draw
arts.sum: Southampton’s Cameron Archer had a goal controversially disallowed as his side shared the spoils with Brighton.

arts.ttl: Draw sees Brighton go 2nd on alphabetical order
arts.sum: Kaoru Mitoma's first-half header for Brighton was cancelled out by a Flynn Downes strike just before the hour as the Seagulls drew 1-1 with Southampton on Friday.

arts.ttl: Aaron Ramsdale fumes at controversial VAR decision in angry social media post
arts.sum: Southampton had a goal ruled out for offside during the second half of their controversial 1-1 draw with Brighton, as VAR took four minutes and 27 seconds to confirm the on-field decision

arts.ttl: Brighton struggled against Southampton press - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton's Head Coach Fabian Hurzeler says his side struggled against Southampton's pressing in their 1-1 draw at the AMEX stadium.

arts.ttl: Premier League issue statement after VAR shambles for Southampton at Brighton
arts.sum: Lengthy VAR check at Brighton denies Southampton
